wordpressPost.content:
Just as humans need oxygen, flowers need CO2 to grow. At LinFlowers we are looking for ways to employ used CO2. After all, it is a shame to make CO2 ourselves, while we want to reduce it in the atmosphere.

This is why we capture CO2 emissions from our energy source and employ them in cultivation. This is how we recycle waste to grow a natural product!
